title: PluginMenu
content:

name: PluginMenu
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A context menu that can be shown in Studio. Displays a list of
  Class.PluginAction|PluginActions and supports submenus.
description: |
  PluginMenu represents a context menu which can be shown in Studio to display
  a list of Class.PluginAction|PluginActions and which also supports submenus.
  A PluginMenu must be created using the Class.Plugin:CreatePluginMenu()
  method in order to work as expected.
codesamples:
  - creating-a-pluginaction-and-pluginmenu
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - NotReplicated
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: PluginMenu.Icon
    summary: |
      The icon to be displayed when used as a submenu.
    description: |
      This property determines the icon to be displayed when used as a submenu.
      It defaults to an empty string "".
    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags:
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: false
    capabilities: []
  - name: PluginMenu.Title
    summary: |
      The text to be displayed when used as a submenu.
    description: |
      This property determines the text to be displayed when a
      Class.PluginMenu is used as a submenu. It defaults to an empty string
      "".
    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags:
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: false
    capabilities: []

    summary: |

    codesamples: []

        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: |

    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: PluginSecurity
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: PluginMenu:AddMenu
    summary: |
      Adds the given menu as a separator.
    description: |
      Adds the given menu as a separator.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: menu
        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: |
          The menu to add as a submenu. Uses its Class.PluginMenu.Title|Title
          and Class.PluginMenu.Icon|Icon to display.
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: PluginSecurity
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: PluginMenu:AddNewAction
    summary: |
      Creates a temporary action that is hidden from Studio's customize
      shortcuts window.
    description: |
      Creates a temporary action that is hidden from Studio's File ‚ü©
      Customize Shortcuts window.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: actionId
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          Must be a unique string that identifies this Class.PluginAction from
          others.
      - name: text
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The text to be displayed.
      - name: icon
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The icon to be displayed.
    returns:
      - type: Instance
        summary: |
          The created Class.PluginAction.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: PluginSecurity
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: PluginMenu:AddSeparator
    summary: |
      Adds a separator between items in the menu.
    description: |
      Adds a separator between items in the menu.
    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''

  - name: PluginMenu:Clear

    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:

        summary: ''

  - name: PluginMenu:ShowAsync
    summary: |
      Shows the menu at the mouse cursor. Yields until either an item is
      selected or the menu is closed.
    description: |
      Shows the menu at the mouse cursor. It yields until either an item is
      selected or the menu is closed. The selected action fires its
      Class.PluginAction.Triggered event.
    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Instance
        summary: |
          The Class.PluginAction item that was selected or nil.
    tags:
      - Yields

    threadsafety: Unsafe
